summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $15.00 or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the general fund, and $98.49, from the Excess Sales Tax Deposit Fund, as a refund of the purchase price paid for lots 19 and 20, block 4, Queen Anne 2nd Addition, which were sold in error for the condemnation of 2nd Avenue, under Ordinance No. 9311, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
